University of Wisconsin Tolkien and Fantasy Society

wikitext.*:
'''Richard C. West''' (August [[1944]] - [[29 November]] [[2020]])<ref> [https://www.tolkiensociety.org/blog/2020/12/richard-c-west-1944-2020/ Richard C. West (1944-2020)] by [[David Bratman]] on tolkiensociety.org </ref> was an awarded [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] scholar and the Serials and Technical Services Librarian at the [http://www.engr.wisc.edu/services/kfw/staff/west_richard.html University of Wisconsin-Madison]. When he was still a student, he also started a [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien Society]] there , the [[University of Wisconsin Tolkien and Fantasy Society|University of Wisconsin Tolkien Society]], in September [[1966]]. He has also contributed to its yearly journal, ''[[Orcrist (journal)|Orcrist]]''.

*[[1970]]: ''[[Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist]]'' (first edition)
* [[1981]]: ''[[Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist]]'' (second, updated edition)

**"Introduction"

* [[1969]]/[[1970]]: ''[[Orcrist (journal)|Orcrist]] 3'' (editor)
**"Introduction"

**"An Annotated Bibliography of Tolkien Criticism, Supplement Two"

**"Introduction"
**"Letters of C. S. Lewis to E. Vinaver"

* [[1975]]: ''[[A Tolkien Compass]]''
**"The Interlace Structure of The Lord of the Rings" (published in Orcrist 1)

**"Introduction"
